org.uilib.templating
Class Options

java.lang.Object
  org.uilib.templating.Options

public class Options
extends Object

Holds options for component and provides methods for working with. For retrieval operations defaults have to be specified, similar to PrefStore.

  • For keys of options only the following characters are valid: a-z,A-Z, '?', '_' and '-'.
  • boolean options values can be "true","false","yes" or "no"
  • an options called "options" will be split by space into a list of boolean options. Specifying options="border bold" equals specifying border=yes and bold=yes. Trying to construct invalid options or options that contradict itself will throw an IllegalArgumentException.

    get

    get

    public ImmutableList<String> get(String key)
    returns an option as a List of Strings. The option's value is splitted by space, the inividual options are trimmed.

    Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if the key was "options" since this is special key that will be split into booleans

    getMap

    public ImmutableMap<String,String> getMap()
    returns this options as a map
